title: Good2Go Auto Insurance Company Expands Call Center Hours -- Representatives Now Available 24/7
content:
SOURCE Good2Go

ATLANTA 

While Good2Go® already offers the fastest auto insurance quotes on the web, and low-cost protection with immediate proof of coverage, this change is another big step forward in providing quality service. Now, whenever a driver calls Good2Go® for a quote, they'll be able to speak with a real person - not just a machine - who can assist with the process or address any questions.

"At Good2Go® we pride ourselves on providing great service at a great rate," say Joe DeLago 

About Good2Go®: Based in Atlanta, GA 

To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit:http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/good2go-auto-insurance-company-expands-call-center-hours----representatives-now-available-247-300143327.html
